title: The U.S. Is Just Different — So Let’s Stop Pretending We’re Not (Ep. 469 Replay)
description: We often look to other countries for smart policies on education, healthcare, infrastructure, etc. But can a smart policy be simply transplanted into a country as culturally unusual (and as supremely WEIRD) as America?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: We often look to other countries for smart policies on education, healthcare, infrastructure, etc. But can a smart policy be simply transplanted into a country as culturally unusual (and as supremely WEIRD) as America?
